title: The Story of the soil
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Morrow Productions
brief_description: The story of the soil from the beginning of earth. How human interference with the partnership between the soil and vegetation has reduced many areas to desolation. Emphasises the need to restore nature’s harmony between climate, soil, plants, animals, and humans.
